channel.title: CVE Feed for Yordam Information Technologies -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Yordam Information Technologies -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-45479|2024-08-04T04:39:21.151Z -- yordam%20information%20technologies -- library%20automation%20system
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation vulnerability in Yordam Information Technologies Library Automation System allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Library Automation System: before 19.2.

item.title: CVE-2021-45478|2024-08-04T04:39:21.053Z -- yordam%20information%20technologies -- library%20automation%20system
item.description: Improper Handling of Parameters vulnerability in Bordam Information Technologies Library Automation System allows Collect Data as Provided by Users.This issue affects Library Automation System: before 19.2.
